body:
### What ?
Liferay Portal provides a smart way to export and import site-level data, through the LAR files, but in certain scenarios it is also necessary to export and import some company-level data (for examples default permissions definitions for roles).
With this tool, you will be able to achieve company-level data exporting and importing.
name: SQLI Im/Ex
tagline: Exporting and importing Liferay company-level data
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
